title: Bloomberg Markets: Bobrinskoy on Indexing and Risk Aversion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bobrinskoy on Indexing and Risk Aversion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Charlie Bobrinskoy Vice Chairman and Head of Investment Group Ariel Investments Discussing two big factors causing distortions, and opportunities, in the markets, indexing and risk aversion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
